Package presentation.block

Class BlockDrawer

java.lang.Object
presentation.block.BlockDrawer
public class BlockDrawer
extends java.lang.Object
Draws the blocks with given settings
Version:
4.0
Author:
Andreas Awouters Thomas Van Erum Dirk Vanbeveren Geert Wesemael

  • Constructor Details

    • BlockDrawer

      BlockDrawer​(java.awt.Color primaryColor, java.awt.Color fontColor)
      Create a new drawer with given colors
      Parameters:
      primaryColor - The primary color of the block.
      fontColor - The color of the font.

  • Method Details

    • drawBlock

      public void drawBlock​(java.awt.Graphics gr, game_world.api.Vector pos, boolean top, boolean bottom, boolean right, boolean left, boolean topOffset, boolean bottomOffset)
      Draws a block with given parameters
      Parameters:
      gr - The graphics object to draw on.
      pos - The upper left position of the block to draw.
      top - Draw the to plug.
      bottom - Draw the bottom socket.
      right - Draw the right socket.
      left - Draw the left plug.
      topOffset - Add an offset from the side bar to the top plug.
      bottomOffset - Add an offset from the side bar to the bottom socket.

    • drawString

      public void drawString​(java.awt.Graphics gr, java.lang.String str, game_world.api.Vector pos)
      Draw a given string on the given position.
      Parameters:
      gr - The graphics object to draw on.
      str - The string to draw.
      pos - The upper left position where to draw.

    • drawSide

      public void drawSide​(java.awt.Graphics gr, game_world.api.Vector pos, int totalHeight)
      Draw a side bar for the block
      Parameters:
      gr - Graphics object to draw on.
      pos - Left upper position of the upper rectangle.
      totalHeight - The total height of the block including internal blocks, top rectangle and bottom rectangle.
